entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mildred Lake

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
